name: generate_llm_response
description: Generates a text response from a Google Generative AI model, supporting both text prompts and file uploads in a single request.

prompt.description: The text prompt or question to send to the model.

api_key.description: A valid Google AI API key for authentication with access to the specified model.

files.description: A list of file paths to upload to the model.

system_prompt.description: A system-level instruction that sets the context or behavior for the model, separate from the user prompt.

model_name.description: Name of the Google Generative AI model, defaulting to `gemini-2.5-pro`.

name: generate_llm_response_with_tools
description: Generates a model response that can include a text response and/or a function call request from the provided tools, which the caller is responsible for executing and returning the result.

api_key.description: A valid Google AI API key for authentication with access to the specified model.

files.description: A list of file paths to be uploaded with the prompt.

model_name.description: Name of the Google Generative AI model to use, defaulting to 'gemini-2.5-pro'.

system_prompt.description: A system-level instruction that sets the model's context or behavior to guide its responses.

tools.description: A list of `Tool` objects defining functions the model can call, created using helpers like `make_tool_from_docstring()`.

name: make_tool_from_docstring
description: Parses a Python function's docstring to create a Google Generative AI `Tool` object for function calling.

docstring.description: The function docstring to convert, containing clear descriptions of its purpose and parameters.

function_name.description: The name of the function the docstring belongs to, which is used as the tool's function name.
